info.name: Hospital Management System API
info.description:
Comprehensive API collection for Hospital Management System with role-based endpoints.

üÜï FLEXIBLE PATIENT BOOKING:
‚úì NEW PATIENTS: Book with full details (name, email, contact, age, gender) - Get auto-generated Patient ID
‚úì EXISTING PATIENTS: Book using only Patient ID (e.g., PAT-2025-000001)
‚úì NO SIGNUP REQUIRED: Both flows work without registration or login

üìã QUICK START:
1. NEW PATIENT: Use 'NEW PATIENT - Book with Full Details' with patient info
2. Get auto-generated Patient ID from response (e.g., PAT-2025-000001)
3. RETURN VISIT: Use 'EXISTING PATIENT - Book with Patient ID Only' with just the Patient ID

üîß TESTING:
Use 'Public Patient Booking' folder for complete booking workflow examples.

item.name: NEW PATIENT - Book with Full Details

request.description:
üÜï NEW PATIENT BOOKING

‚úÖ For first-time patients who don't have a Patient ID yet
‚úÖ System auto-generates Patient ID (e.g., PAT-2025-000001)
‚úÖ Staff can only book for their own department
‚úÖ Doctor must belong to staff's department

Required Fields:
- doctorId: ID of doctor from staff's department
- departmentId: Must match staff's department
- date: Appointment date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- time: Appointment time (HH:MM)
- patientName: Full name
- patientEmail: Valid email
- patientContact: Phone number
- patientAge: Age in years
- patientGender: Male/Female/Other

Optional Fields:
- patientAddress
- emergencyContact

üìù Response includes:
- Auto-generated Patient ID for future use
- Complete appointment details
- isNewPatient: true flag

item.name: EXISTING PATIENT - Book with Patient ID

request.description:
‚ö° EXISTING PATIENT BOOKING

‚úÖ For returning patients who already have a Patient ID
‚úÖ Just provide Patient ID - no other patient details needed
‚úÖ Super fast booking process
‚úÖ Staff can only book for their own department
‚úÖ Doctor must belong to staff's department

Required Fields:
- patientId: Patient ID (e.g., PAT-2025-000001) or MongoDB _id
- doctorId: ID of doctor from staff's department
- departmentId: Must match staff's department
- date: Appointment date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- time: Appointment time (HH:MM)

üìù Response includes:
- Patient details (fetched automatically)
- Complete appointment details
- isNewPatient: false flag

üîí UPDATE APPOINTMENT STATUS (Department Restricted)

‚úÖ Staff can only update appointments in their own department
‚úÖ Cannot modify appointments from other departments

Valid Status Values:
- Attended: Patient attended the appointment
- Missed: Patient did not show up

Security:
- Validates appointment belongs to staff's department
- Returns 403 Forbidden if attempting to update other department's appointments

request.description:
üîí GET ALL APPOINTMENTS (Department Restricted)

‚úÖ Automatically shows only appointments from staff's department
‚úÖ Cannot view appointments from other departments
‚úÖ Supports multiple filters

Query Parameters (all optional):
- status: Filter by appointment status (Booked, Attended, Missed)
- date: Filter by specific date (YYYY-MM-DD format)
- doctorId: Filter by specific doctor (must be from staff's department)

Response includes:
- total: Total number of appointments
- appointments: Array of appointment objects with populated doctor, patient, and department details

üîí GET TODAY'S SCHEDULE (Department Restricted)

‚úÖ Shows only TODAY's appointments for staff's department
‚úÖ Automatically uses current date
‚úÖ Grouped by doctors
‚úÖ Includes statistics

Response includes:
- date: Today's date
- schedules: Array of doctors with their appointments
  - doctorName, specialization, department
  - totalAppointments, attended, missed, booked counts
  - appointments: Array of today's appointments for each doctor

Use Cases:
- Morning briefing
- Check today's workload
- Track patient arrivals
- Update appointment statuses

üîí GET DAILY SCHEDULE FOR SPECIFIC DATE (Department Restricted)

‚úÖ View schedule for any specific date
‚úÖ Shows only appointments for staff's department
‚úÖ Grouped by doctors with statistics
‚úÖ Perfect for planning ahead

URL Parameter:
- date: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., 2025-10-20)

Response includes:
- date: Requested date
- totalDoctors: Number of doctors with appointments
- totalAppointments: Total appointments across all doctors
- schedules: Array of doctors with their appointments
  - doctorName, specialization, department
  - totalAppointments, attended, missed, booked counts
  - appointments: Array of appointments for each doctor

Use Cases:
- Plan future schedules
- Check availability for specific dates
- Review past appointments
- Generate daily reports
